Hi, Guys, I think Chirpy is great and all that (same as everyone else :-)

But this simple bug does not seem to have been fixed for a while now.

This is the entry in the MyMash.chirp.config:

    <FileGroup Name="SomeTests.js">
        <Folder Path="..\..\..\TestProj\TestFolder\" Pattern="*.js" Minify="false" />
    </FileGroup>

 

This config entry has the effect of putting chirpy into an infinite loop; and from the console one can see SomeTests.js being repeated written to.

I am using the latest version (2.0.0.4 released on 04-Jan-2012).

Is there a solution to this problem? Needless to say this will be much appreciated.

Thanks!
